title: Publications
text:

in revision

Ustekinumab and vedolizumab exposure is unaffected by pharmacogenetic determinants of anti-TNFs pharmacokinetics.
Inflammatory Bowel Diseases accepted

Therapeutic Advances in Gastroenterology PMID: 37655059

Inflammatory Bowel Diseases PMID: 34751766

British Journal of Clinical Pharmacology PMID: 33604964
